pullrequest.title: add pkg-config as a base dependency, so we can use it for an ign-cmake test

content.raw: Adding it here instead of adding it in the formula could end in problems for other CI setups or ign-cmake installations on a clean system installing it automatically from the formula dependencies \(happen to me with some packages in Linux for the Debian CI system\). We could add it in both sides.
content.html: Adding it here instead of adding it in the formula could end in problems for other CI setups or ign-cmake installations on a clean system installing it automatically from the formula dependencies (happen to me with some packages in Linux for the Debian CI system). We could add it in both sides.
